subject: Re: [EVP-ITC] Re: Box 12
author: Frank Sumption
full_text:
DOH! That's what I thought too. Although there's alot to said for ritual 
magic. I used to do some, but it involved tobacco rituals, as in Native 
American type,  and I'm not allowed to touch the stuff now, but the results 
were profound, even for me.

Frank-S


>From: Frank Ratka <warrior18eii@...>
>Reply-To: EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com
>To: EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com
>Subject: Re: [EVP-ITC] Re: Box 12
>Date: Fri, 13 Jul 2007 04:57:03 -0700 (PDT)
>
>Oh, that's what you mean by imprinting. I had this vision in my head that 
>you were doing some new age, melodramatic ritual over the box to infuse it 
>with some kind of magical energy. All you were doing is making our spirit 
>colleagues aware of your presence and intentions to use the box.
>
>We did the same sort of thing with a statement of intent and introduction.
>
>Thanx for the feedback,
>
>Frank R.
